items.sentence: Tom opened the front door to let his dog in.
Tell Tom I don't know who Mary's husband is.
Mary is in her room, playing with her dolls.
Is it true that you're the one who did that?
How long has it been since you last saw Tom?
Tom wanted everyone to shut up and sit down.
Tom knew that Mary would be back any minute.
I heard that Tom wouldn't help Mary do that.
How did Tom know that Mary wouldn't do that?
Do you think Tom knows that Mary is married?
Didn't you know that Tom was Mary's brother?
Both Tom and Mary know that that's not true.
Both Tom and Mary know that that isn't true.
Tom was the one who taught Mary how to swim.
Tom was the one who washed your car for you.
Tom told me exactly the same thing Mary did.
Tom was able to do that in less than a week.
Tom was afraid that somebody would hear him.
Tom was born in Australia and grew up there.
Tom was eating by himself at a corner table.
